// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

var url = 'http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/postcgi.py';
var data = {number1: '21', number2: '21'};

// Create a FormData object
var formData = new FormData();

// Append data to the FormData object
for (var key in data) {
    formData.append(key, data[key]);
}

fetch(url, {
  method: 'POST',
  // The Fetch API will automatically set the 'Content-Type' header to 'multipart/form-data'
  // and generate the appropriate 'boundary' parameter when you pass a FormData object in the body
  body: formData,
})
.then((data) => {
  console.log('Success:', data);
});

var url = 'http://localhost:8080/uploads/deleteme.txt';

fetch(url, {
  method: 'DELETE'
})
.then((data) => {
  console.log('Success:', data);
})

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: plain/text" --data "" http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/postcgi.py
curl -X DELETE http://localhost:8080/uploads/deleteme.txt
curl -X UNKNOWN http://localhost:8080/
